scripts.build: npm run build-osx && npm run build-linux && npm run build-windows

releases.body:
- Update electron
- Create installers for macOS, Windows and Linux

- Added zoom function
- update to newest electron

- add dark mode
- update to newest electron

- add missing media files to linux build. fixes #3 
- fix missing icon on linux
- update to electron 0.36.3
- add support to minimize to tray and close to tray for Windows

- use electron 0.35.2
- Notification support for Windows 8 and above

- save and restore size and position of the window
- new logo
